name: SantaClaus

”Alexa, start Santa Claus”
”Alexa, play Santa Claus”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa claus
des: Santa Claus is making a list and checking it twice! Do you want to know if you are naughty or nice? "Alexa, ask Santa Claus if I'm naughty or nice" to find out!.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
